org.dockbox.selene.core.inventory

Interface InventoryLayout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpongeInventoryLayout

    public interface InventoryLayout
    Represents the layout of a inventory. Typically this is responsible for placing the default elements in a Pane.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LayoutBuilder builder(InventoryType inventoryType)
      Create a new LayoutBuilder instance.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Element> getElements()
      Get all the elements in the inventory, identified by their position index.
      InventoryType getIventoryType()
      Get the inventory type used by the layout.
